name: Steel Love - The Game
description:
Submitted for the Robot Party Game Jam 

Love knows no reason, no boundaries, no distance. It has a sole intention of bringing living beings together to a time called forever. However, love also causes drama and pain. Experience a mindblowing steel loving text-based adventure starring multiple of your favourite characters and find out who the real star of love is.

-------------------------------------------------------

I have never made anything like this and I have zero experience in any of this. Literally every simple step took me way too long. But it was fun. I hope at least one person plays and finishes this game. Thank you if you play it.

-------------------------------------------------------

Credits:

I used sound effects from https://www.zapsplat.com

I used several character drawings of Kyle Bosman as basis for some of the pictures
